title: varuvAi paradEvataiyE
sahitya:
varuvAi paradEvataiyE varuvAi karuNai niraivAi


anupallavi

  varuvAi aruLE uruvAi ilagum tiruvE arivE shiva shankariyE


caraNam 1    shakti shuDarE varuvA jIvan muktikkoLiyE varuvAi
bhaktarkkamudE parivE uruvAi paripUraNiyE jaya nAraNiyE
    caraNam 2    sEyAi maDi mIdinilE bhuvit-tAyE enai EtraruLAi
nIyE ihamum paramum sukhamum nilaiyum kalaiyum tavamum varamun
    caraNam 3    uyir yAzhinai nI mITTAi shakti unadanburugum pATTAi
jaya kALi mahEshvari lakSmi vANi jagadIshvariyE sharaNam sharaNam
